recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
Assembly 1 - Mise en place:

1. Transfer sriracha aioli to plastic squeeze bottles. Hold at 41°F or 
below.

2. Chop cooked bacon into 1/2" pieces. Hold at 135°F or above.

3. Cut hamburger buns in half horizontally. Cover, label, and hold at 
room temp.

Assembly 3 - To Prepare Burger Patties:

1. Preheat flat top griddle to 400°F.

2. Season patties with 1/8 tsp each of salt and pepper.

3. Place patties on flattop and cook 2 minutes per side, or until 
well-seared. Internal temp should reach at least 155°F.

4. Transfer cooked patties in a single layer in half #200 perforated 
pans set over solid #200 half pans. 

5. Hold in warmer at 135°F or above until service.

Assembly 4 - To Cook Eggs:

1. Place fried eggs in #200 pans, up to 20 per pan.

2. Preheat combi-oven to 350°F, convection setting.

3. Place 1 slice gruyere cheese on top of each egg. 

4. Finish in oven for 1 min.

5. Hold at 135°F or above for no longer then 20 minutes.

Assembly 5 - To Toss Arugula:

1. Toss arugula with lemon juice, set aside for assembly.


To Assemble 1 Burger:

1. Place the two halves of a hamburger bun on a plate.

2. Squeeze a 1 tsp pinwheel of sriracha aioli on each bun half.

3. Build each burger in the following order from bottom to top:
 1 tbsp chopped bacon
 1 burger patty
 1 fried egg with gruyere
 1 tbsp tossed arugula
 
4. Close the sandwich and serve immediately.
